entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • "Unknown switch" when trying to compile NativeAOT. #97006
  • OpenSslCachedSystemStoreProvider DER loading does not work #97001
    9.0.0
  • Array variance checks are not optimized away for types known to be not arrays #97000
    9.0.0
  • JIT: Loop alignment is computed incorrectly in some cases after `BBJ_NONE` removal #96998
    9.0.0
  • Large MacOS deployed size with NativeAOT including large __LINKEDIT file #96997
  • System.Text.Json ignores properties that override the setter only. #96996
    Future
  • StartTransportLayerSecurity(...) method throw an exception when using System.DirectoryServices.Protocols in version 8.0.0 on Linux #96988
  • Async/await tasks hold references to the intermediate results #96987
  • Call to gc_heap::create_bgc_thread hanging #96984
  • Nuget Update for CVE-2024-0057 #96981
  • Could not load file or assembly 'System.Numerics.Vectors, Version=4.1.3.0, or one of its dependencies. #96980
  • The DiagnosticsHelper.CompareTags method assumes that the list for the default meter factory create method is sorted, but the list is not sorted.” #96979
    Future
  • [RISC-V] Optimizing assemblies for size failed #96978
  • Exception when using None as method parameter of a python client with a .NET 8 COM server #96976
  • [API Proposal]: `SpinLockTakenScope` and `SpinLock.Take` #96975
  • [API Proposal]: System.ServiceModel.Syndication equivalent for SiteMap and SiteMapIndex files #96973
  • [Mono][RISCV] How can I Debugging Multi-thread problems of Mono #96971
  • Unable to profile Mac Catalyst apps with `dotnet trace` #96970
  • Test failure BasicEventSourceTests.TestsUserErrors.Test_BadEventSource_MismatchedIds_WithEtwListener #96968
    9.0.0
  • Test failure JIT/Regression/JitBlue/GitHub_65690/GitHub_65690/GitHub_65690.cmd #96967
  • Test failure System.Diagnostics.Metrics.Tests.MetricsTests.TestMeterCreationWithOptions #96966
  • Update code fix for SYSLIB1054 to use a collection expression #96964
    Future

Closed

  • [iOS/macOS] Time zone APIs don't reflect system time zone change #97010
  • Question regarding freshness of volatile reading of a value written with Interlocked #97007
  • [API Proposal]: AVX-512 Masking helper functions #96986
  • [Android][arm] Package net.dot.System.Numerics.Tensors.Tests could not be assigned a valid UID #96922
  • [API Proposal] Expose `System.String` static methods as string extensions #79020
    Future
  • [wasm] Failing test `System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript.Tests.WebWorkerTest.ManagedDelay_ContinueWith` #96493
  • `XmlNode.Prefix` should have `[AllowNull]` #96882
    Future
  • ExecutionEngineException in WinForms app (Paint.NET) on .NET 8 RC2, which does not occur in .NET 7 (GCStress) #94579
    9.0.0
  • iOS NativeAOT testing app failing to build in performance pipeline #96868
    9.0.0
  • Provide access to dynamically created instruments via DI #96305
    Future
  • Test_EventSource_EtwManifestGeneration* tests failing in CI #48798
    Future
  • System.Text.Json Source Generator throws "CS0306: Type“ReadOnlySpan<byte> cannot be used as type argument" on certain class due to unknown reason #96540
  • [API Proposal]: Make Unsafe work with readonly byref values #69352
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Parse/format `Half`s from/to UTF-8. #75313
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: add direct buffer access to SocketAddress #78757
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Enumerable.Chunk (Array) #85653
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Analyzer to detect if method called twice #92018

PullRequests

Created

  • JIT: Allow jump-to-next-block removal for blocks with alignment #97011
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix native AOT outerloop #97008
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • JIT: Fold more always failing type checks #97005
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Type test `List<T>` in Enumerable.SequenceEquals and forward to `MemoryExtensions.SequenceEqual(span...)` #97004
    area-System.Linq, community-contribution
  • Rewind the BIO before attempting to re-process as DER #97003
    area-System.Security
  • [release/8.0][browser] BrowserWebSocket.ReceiveAsync after server initiated close #97002
    Servicing-consider, arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 8.0.x
  • JIT: Port loop compaction to new loop representation #96995
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] macOS: Set certificate as a dependency of private key handles #96993
    area-System.Security, 8.0.x
  • Add Arm64 encodings for IF_SVE_CY_3A and IF_SVE_CY_3B group #96992
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [NativeAOT] Remove obsolete C++ name mangling #96983
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Implement getStaticFieldCurrentClass for NAOT #96982
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [iOS][non-icu] HybridGlobalization clean up the code #96974
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios
  • Don't shorten OCSP expriation on failed server OCSP fetch #96972
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Update HP libunwind to v1.8.0 #96969
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution

Merged

  • [release/8.0-staging] [iOS][tvOS] Fix building runtime tests on iOS-like platforms #96994
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-mono, 8.0.x
  • Simplify RuntimeType.SplitName #96991
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution
  • Cleanup some outdated helpers in libraries/Common #95515
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • Add `[AllowNull]` to XmlNode.Prefix #96912
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution
  • [perf] Use HybridGlobalization as default and only option for Apple mobile platforms #96918
    tenet-performance, area-Infrastructure-mono, 9.0.0
  • [mono] Adding osx-arm64 Mono Interpreter runtime tests job to extra-platforms #96023
    area-Infrastructure-mono

Updated

  • Test #96650
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-VM-coreclr
  • Inline properties during importation #96325
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Enable EVEX feature: Embedded Rounding for Avx512F.Add() #94684
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • [NativeAOT] 32-bit platform ObjWriter and bit rot fixes #96890
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [browser][MT] WebSocket thread affinity & server initiated close #96618
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [QUIC] Call silent shutdown in case `CloseAsync` failed. #96807
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • FreeBSD: Add suffix numbering for OpenSSL3 #96961
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Ensure that the Create(Dot(...)) optimization doesn't kick in for Vector2 pre SSE4.1 #96951
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] Test HalfTest: fixed payload preservation testcase for RISC-V #96888
    community-contribution, arch-riscv, needs-area-label
  • chore(ilc/mach-o): add workaround or fix for problem with dead_strip #96743
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [mono] Add runtime support for Swift calling convention on x64 and arm64 #94764
    area-VM-meta-mono, new-api-needs-documentation, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • [mono] [tests] Set error for mono_fullaot runtime tests when no suitable tests are found #96902
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • JIT: Allow BBJ_COND false target to diverge from bbNext in layout optimization phase #96609
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT ARM64: Add IF_SVE_DT_3A, IF_SVE_DU_3A, IF_SVE_DX_3A, IF_SVE_DY_3A #96201
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve
  • [browser][HybridGlobalization] Improve speed performance of IndexOf and LastIndexOf text APIs with HybridGlobalization mode #95583
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization
  • [browser] remove legacy js interop #96841
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0] Fix native memory leak on OCSP_Response #96577
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Security, 8.0.x
  • [release/7.0] Fix native memory leak on OCSP_Response #96578
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Security, 7.0.x
  • [release/7.0] Fix server-side OCSP stapling on Linux #96808
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Net.Security, os-linux, 7.0.x
  • extend MemoryCache with `ICollection<object> Keys` property #94992
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Caching, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Delete old DFS and dominator implementations #96927
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono] Enable NativeToManaged wrappers to get compiled with LLVM #96910
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • [browser] Use whole assembly name when looking for already loaded assemblies #96018
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Add note about docker in the testing doc (fix #95436) #95557
    documentation, area-Meta, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • [release/8.0] Fix server-side OCSP stapling on Linux #96838
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Net.Security, 8.0.x
  • Disable load/store vector APIs until Mono adds support for it #96944
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [RISC-V] Added designated output instruction emitters #96741
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [RISC-V] Enable On Stack Replacement #96558
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Hardware accelerated implementation of Quaternion multiply #96624
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • EventPipe: Don't clean up thread list on shutdown #96936
    EventPipe, area-Tracing-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Make startup hooks kind of work with native AOT #96894
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix assertion at BigInteger.TryParse(null, out _) #96930
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Adding vectorized implementations of Log to Vector64/128/256/512 #96913
    area-System.Numerics
  • Reintroduce case sensitive comparison optimization for FrozenDictionary in some cases #95232
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
